title: Niger Money Supply M0
description: Money Supply M0 in Niger decreased to 715200 XOF Million in August from 721900 XOF Million in July of 2022. Money Supply M0 in Niger averaged 434868.90 XOF Million from 2004 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 815782 XOF Million in June of 2017 and a record low of 104728 XOF Million in February of 2004. This page provides - Niger Money Supply M0- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Central Bank of West African States (BCEAO)
